bibl.title: A tax register from Roman Fayum
bibl.seg: 145.4 P. Wessely Pragenses Inv. Gr. III 95b
Nikolaos Gonis, A Tax Register from Roman Fayum.

Revised edition of P.Prag. inv. III 95b [ed.: Balász Kiss, P. Prag. Gr. III 95b, Byzanz und das Abendland VI. Studia Byzantino-Occidentalia = Antiquitas, Byzantium, Renascentia. 38 (Budapest, 2019) pp. 259-270, figg.]. Late second or early third century.
bibl.note: Revised edition of P.Prag. inv. III 95b [ed.: Balász Kiss, P. Prag. Gr. III 95b, Byzanz und das Abendland VI. Studia Byzantino-Occidentalia = Antiquitas, Byzantium, Renascentia. 38 (Budapest, 2019) pp. 259-270, figg.]. Late second or early third century.
